entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Async Console Read Cannot Be Cancelled #100308
  • Browser SignalRClientTests failing in CI #100307
    9.0.0
  • JsonSerializer.Deserialize/Serialize using JsonTypeInfo fails on Type emitted using TypeBuilder.CreateType #100305
  • [API Proposal]: WriteOnlySpan<T> #100302
  • REG_SECRET_STUB_PARAM restore from stack #100301
  • Allow downloading WebAssembly resources without performing other WebAssembly runtime initalization #100299
    9.0.0
  • System.Runtime.Loader.Tests.AssemblyLoadContextTest.Unload_CollectibleWithTwoAssemblies [FAIL] #100295
  • [API Proposal]: buffer-based distributed caching API - #100290
  • GetUnicode_Invalid/GetAscii_Invalid test failures on Fedora 40 #100287
    9.0.0
  • [mono][android] Investigate failures on Linux Bionic [x64/arm64] jobs #100281
    9.0.0
  • [browser] Unable to evaluate script: tab crashed #100275
    9.0.0
  • Update instructions for running Console ManualTests #100274
  • [browser][MT] enable jiterp #100273
    9.0.0
  • Json data parsing in MAUI .NET 8 #100312
  • [Question] How to set proxy just for AAD endpoint? #100268

Closed

  • .net core 8 UDP Socket gets stuck on the first endpoint it sends to #99863
    9.0.0
  • [SslStress] SocketException (111): Connection refused #94222
    9.0.0
  • Subset Help No Longer Works In Main Build Script #100042
    9.0.0
  • [AOT publish error] EXEC : error : Arithmetic operation resulted in an overflow. #97235
  • Socket.Bind does not work with any UDP port on Mac OSX or Ubuntu 22.04.2 LTS #100043
  • AF: m_alignpad == 0 (LibraryImportGenerator.Unit.Tests) #91569
    9.0.0
  • System.Net.Quic.Tests.QuicStreamTests.ReadsClosedFinishes_ConnectionClose CI test failure #99142
    9.0.0
  • ITypeLib2 COM type definition is wrong (since forever) #99946
    9.0.0
  • NET8 WcfClient (net-tcp binding) running on linux cannot be authenticated on WCF Server hosted on windows if UseManagedNtlm is set #99227
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Default SearchValues character classes #100244
  • NullabilityInfoContext is not thread-safe #100254
  • [6.0] Failure in System.Net.Security.Tests.SyncSslStreamSystemDefaultTest.ClientAndServer_OneOrBothUseDefault_Ok due to remote TLS alert 'ProtocolVersion' #98394
    9.0.0
  • Queue<T>.Dequeue throws NullReferenceException in .NET 8 Release build #98961
  • NativeName on CurrentCulture is shorten on Blazor WebAssembly .NET 5.0 #44739
    9.0.0
  • [Analyzer Proposal]: Analyzer/fixer for converting Stream.Read calls to ReadAtLeast and ReadExactly #69159
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove concept of temporary dynamic IL #100318
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Add Task.WhenEach to process tasks as they complete #100316
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Several improvements / simplifications in Regex #100315
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Update doc on using local apphost to reflect that the testhost layout uses the live-built host #100314
    area-Host
  • Update r2r version and do any removals that we wanted to do at the next R2R minimum version bump #100310
    area-ReadyToRun-coreclr
  • Disable msvc vectorization in GC get_promoted_bytes #100309
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [browser] fix bit width from 32 to 8 for managed boolean #100304
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] [HttpStress] [SslStress] Workaround image bug in 1es-windows-2022-open #100303
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Revert "xor before setcc" opt #100298
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Instrumentation #100294
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-GC-mono
  • Remove preventing EH and entering EE at shutdown #100293
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Align up structs to IntPtr.Size if they have gc pointers #100289
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [mono][wasm] Force interpreter to initialize the pointers #100288
    arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono
  • Eliminate unused virtual methods we detect after optimizations #100286
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: Add separate ABI classifiers for x86/win-x64/SysV-x64/ARM64 #100276
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Console.Unix: revert SetWindowSize implementation. #100272
    area-System.Console, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Apply eslint formatting in JS/TS #100271
    arch-wasm, needs-area-label
  • Roll back conversion of native aot tests to merged model #100269
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Move last P/Invoke error from native Thread and delete C/C++ SafeHandle implementation #100267
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • [wasm] Use source built emsdk packages for the runtime build #100266
    area-Build-mono

Merged

  • Tighten `SideEffectSet::InterferesWith` #100300
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Add peephole for reversing BBJ_COND condition and removing false jump #100262
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Check for server readiness before starting ssl stress test #100296
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Simplify floating point mod and round jit helpers implementations #100222
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] Always zero-init if object contains pointers #100265
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Harden SecKeyCopyExternalRepresentation against sensitive keys #99840
    area-System.Security
  • Remove obsolete CopySrcInsteadOfClone source-build property #100291
    needs-area-label
  • Fix Build Subset Help Not Displaying #100261
    area-Infrastructure, 9.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Fix building errors in emitriscv64.cpp on windows #100270
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • JIT: Fix mangleVarArgsType for SIMD types #100278
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Generalize `hasFixedRetBuffReg` for ARM64 #100277
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] [HTTP/2] Fix handling of effectively empty DATA frame (#99502) #99677
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.x
  • [release/6.0-staging] [HTTP/2] Fix handling of effectively empty DATA frame (#99502) #99678
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.x
  • Deduplicate header Separator logic #100179
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • Prevent hoisting nodes with order side effects #100160
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • The layout of the `ITypeLib2` interface is incorrect. #100255
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 9.0.0
  • Fix NegotiateStream connections between Linux clients and Windows servers #99909
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • remove test references to obsolete OSes #100247
    area-System.Net, test-enhancement, 9.0.0
  • JIT: initial work on general count reconstruction #99992
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Process.OSX: fix thread safety #100260
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution
  • Delay MsQuicSendBuffers disposal to QuicStream safe handle closing. #100228
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [browser] Revert to full `NativeName` by interop with JS #99956
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization, os-browser
  • [browser] Move `GenerateJSModuleManifest` from pack to sdk #99675
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Remove `GT_MKREFANY` #100204
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Clean up some call multi-reg ret handling #99679
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Provide System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow package readme #99664
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, community-contribution

Updated

  • Allow trimming FeatureGuard and FeatureSwitchDefinition attributes #100263
    linkable-framework, needs-area-label
  • [release/8.0-staging] Support building against clang 18 #100258
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Improve collided exception performance #100169
    NO-REVIEW, area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [cdac] Data Descriptor Spec #100253
    documentation, area-Meta
  • Dynamic event support #99862
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Make sure we compact the LOH when aggressive GC is requested #98954
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Support setting NamedPipeClientStream.ReadMode with PipeAccessRights ctor overload #100001
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Vectorized `GetNonRandomizedHashCode` #98838
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Scalar/Packed conversions for floating point to integer #97529
    breaking-change, area-CodeGen-coreclr, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution
  • [ILLink] Mark recursive interface implementations in MarkStep #99922
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Reenable C4242 and C4244 warnings in libunwind #100241
    Security, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Switch to iSimdVector and Align WidenAsciiToUtf16 #99982
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0-staging] fix SendTo with SocketAsyncEventArgs #99695
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net.Sockets, 8.0.x
  • Enable FEATURE_PERFMAP on OSX, and update perfjitdump.cpp to work on OSX #99986
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Run HTTP3 stress with Adress sanitization #100023
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Convert OAVariant interop to managed #100176
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Implement `ShuffleUnsafe` methods #99596
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, tenet-performance, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Update Alpine versions for `release/8.0-staging` #99849
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • Initialize values for yield normalization during startup #99991
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Rewrite math jit helpers to managed code #98858
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [browser][MT] mono_wasm_schedule_synchronization_context #100251
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Make normal statics simpler #99183
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-coreclr
  • Fix JitOptRepeat #94250
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] [net7] Stop exporting ICU symbols from Mono #100063
    Servicing-rejected, area-System.Globalization, runtime-mono, os-ios, 7.0.x
  • [release/8.0-staging] Call the Copy Constructor for stack arguments in C++/CLI on x86 #100221
    Servicing-approved, area-Interop-coreclr, 8.0.5
  • [wasm] use sbrk instead of emscripten mmap or malloc when loading bytes into heap #100106
    arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono
  • [Mono][infra] Disable failing tests/pipelines on runtime-extra-platforms #100227
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • [browser][wbt] Debug InnerSendMessageToServerAsync #100182
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser
  • [browser] load core assemblies first #100141
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Use likelihood-based edge weights #99736
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] WiP: Simplify flags for passing struct in registers #100080
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [release/8.0] Don't unset ALPN list pointer during ALPN selection callback. #99670
    area-System.Net.Security, 8.0.x
  • Implement swift lowering algorithm in Mono's type system #99439
    area-Interop-mono
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix Http2 deadlock #100086
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [release/9.0-preview3] Revert #99140 #100147
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser][MT] Handling blocking wait #99833
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [ci] Fix Playwright test times out/fails because target closed #100074
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono
  • [browser] reduce use of wrap_error_root #100233
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [mono][HybridGlobalization] Fix ShortDatePattern year format to be "yyyy" #99908
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • Include versions and checksums in VMR publishing and remove prepare-artifacts.proj #100004
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • JIT: Fix LA64 and RISCV64 build errors on Windows #100099
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [riscv64] fix linq MixedScope test #96671
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, needs-author-action, arch-riscv
  • Redesign the frame layout to avoid the redundant computation of the stackOffsets #99278
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix #91958: use mach_timebase_info to determine process time coefficient on macOS #100122
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, os-mac-os-x, 8.0.x
  • Start moving over to official templates #99433
    area-Infrastructure, linkable-framework
  • Rebase the installer build jobs on the global build job template #100110
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • NativeAOT/win-x86: Enable FEATURE_EH_CALLFINALLY_THUNKS #99718
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-26
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Review struct and enum projections in C# for CryptoKit dev templates #2533

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet/format integration tests running on official builds #39789
  • The positioning of libraries is inconsistent on different operating systems #39783
  • Re-enable CanSortByDownloadCountAndThenByName Template Engine test #39772

Closed

  • PrivateAssets=all has different behavior than PrivateAssets=compile;build;buildTransitive.... #39465
    Discussion
  • 8.0.203 for Ubuntu not published on Microsoft repo #39664
  • [Bug]: `-getProperty` shows workloads update message #37520
    8.0.3xx
  • `dotnet sln list` unconditionally prints header and is less machine readable. #39771
  • Unable to resolve dotnetcli.blob.core.windows.net (releases-index.json) #39685

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix publishing and don't run formatting tests in official builds #39790
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'main' #39786
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/7.0.1xx] skip CanSortByDownloadCountAndThenByName because it's blocking #39781
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/7.0.3xx] skip CanSortByDownloadCountAndThenByName because it's blocking #39779
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/7.0.4xx] skip CanSortByDownloadCountAndThenByName because it's blocking #39778
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.1xx] skip CanSortByDownloadCountAndThenByName because it's blocking #39776
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.2xx] skip CanSortByDownloadCountAndThenByName because it's blocking #39775
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.1xx] Migrate to 1ES templates for internal builds #39764
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • [release/9.0.1xx-preview3] skip CanSortByDownloadCountAndThenByName because it's blocking #39777
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Create a new label with TFM of the app and the SDK used to build the image #39196
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • dotnet watch refactoring #39410
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Use MicroBuildOutputFolderOverride to move the MicroBuild plugin install directory #39787
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'main' #39531
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2414538 #39615
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.3xx] skip CanSortByDownloadCountAndThenByName because it's blocking #39774
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Publish Roslyn Framework Toolset package as part of SDK #39743
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • skip CanSortByDownloadCountAndThenByName because it's blocking #39773
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Rewrite dotnet watch command line parsing #39618
    untriaged, Area-Watch
  • Update EOL versions #39645
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • use noble Ubuntu images by default starting in 8.0.300, #39614
    untriaged, DO NOT MERGE, Area-Containers

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-26
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Support default parameter values in lambdas #6051
    12.0
  • Anonymous Interface Objects #4301

PullRequests

Created

  • Collection expressions: require Add method callable with a single argument for class and struct types that do not use [CollectionBuilder] #8022

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Params Span<T> errors ambiguity for null and inline arrays #72748
  • code cleanup => Remove unnecessary string.ToString() calls #72742
  • Add ability to exclude certain files and folders from analysis without marking them as GENERATED #72736
  • "Editor Color Scheme" option is not available when using the "Use system setting" color theme #72735

Closed

  • Obsolete error should be reported for container class of a collection expression builder class #70742
    17.10
  • Code using collection expression that compiled in .NET 8/.NET 9 preview.1 produces CS9215 in .NET 9 preview.2 #72668
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-34725.195 #72740
  • Code fix for IDE0028 produces invalid collection expression #71240
    17.10 P4
  • After upgrading Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.Workspace from 4.2.0 to 4.3.0 it started throwing at runtime #63921
    17.6 P3
  • Unnecessary creation of ITextBuffer just to get a checksum #72703

PullRequests

Created

  • Unify ManagedHotReloadLanguageService service moniker between VS and CDK #72747
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Prefer semantic classifications over syntactic ones when both occur at the same location #72746
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Handle razor `@:` transitions as comments #72745
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Update ConstructedNamedTypeSymbol to use OneOrMany instead of ImmutableArray #72741
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Switch our copy/paste tagger over to using the same layering algorithm we use for normal classification. #72739
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove diagnostic scaffolding for sending diagnostics events from HostDiagnosticUpdateSource. #72731
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Proffer ManagedHotReloadLanguageService brokered service in VS #72737
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, Next
  • Fix LspFileChangeWatcher case sensitivity #72555
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.10 to main #72743
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Fixes for Linux release build #72658
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Modify BinderFactory to use a shared pool instead of one per BinderFactory instance. #72725
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Revert "Simplify updating the primary workspace without passing in a version" #72723
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Insert release/dev17.10 to main for now #72738
    Next
  • Remove serialization of SourceTexts #72722
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Store and display the times when files were generated. #72724
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Compiler server fixes #72716
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Remove diagnostic analyzer service event ability #72730
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • IEmbeddedLanguageClassificationService is optional in the workspaces layer #72712
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.10 to main #72733
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.9 to release/dev17.10 #72636
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts, Needs API Review
  • Remove additional parts of legacy diagnostics system. #72718
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.10 to main #72732
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Update config for 17.10 P3 snap #72728
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Snap 17.10 P3 #72727
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Serialize the content hash for a source text so it does not need to be recomputed #72705
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Allow ref-like locals in iterators and async methods #72664
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref/Unsafe in Iterators/Async
  • Correct active statement span tracking #72690
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.ExternalAccess.VisualDiagnostics #72296
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: require Add method callable with a single argument for class and struct types that do not use [CollectionBuilder] #72654
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2415278 #72644
    auto-merge
  • Delay slicing in list pattern until all other element patterns are matched #70615
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, 17.10
  • Add feature to strike out obsolete symbols #72156
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • All pull diagnostics changes. #62771
    Area-IDE
  • Remove system for dumping text files into memory mapped files. #70160
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Merge latest bits from `main` branch into extensions branch #72684
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Consider `params` and default values when comparing signatures #71380
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Lambda Improvements, New Language Feature - Default lambda parameters
  • Provide option to only update source-generators on special events (like a build) #72494
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • [C#] Make interpolated strings including string or char constants as optimized as `+` operator #72308
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Disallow dynamic calls on ref struct receivers #72674
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix infinite load loop loading WPF projects in VSCode #72625
    Area-IDE, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • DataAnnotationsValidator fails to [in]validate on submit a model that it successfully [in]validates while editing #54792
  • Added retry for `CheckInvalidHostingModelParameter` #54785
  • Programmatically set preventDefault and stopPropagation #54782
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcgo #54780
  • Failing `signalr.client.java.Tests` on helix because of missing `java` #54775
  • Add AnyHeader and AnyMethod to src/Middleware/CORS/src/Infrastructure/CorsConstants.cs #54772
  • VS 2022 17.9.4 Hot Reload Razor Pages Project run debug WebSocket failed to connect. #54769
  • Blazor handling of overlay components #54768
  • Blazor PWA not fetching app when its cached -> cannot work offline #54767
  • Perf improvement: json, plaintext #54764
  • Quarantine ThreadingHostedAppTest.{HasHeading,CounterPageCanUseThreads,NavMenuHighlightsCurrentLocation} #54761
  • Stream Rendering Not Working #54759

Closed

  • Perf regression: fortunes_ef #54749
  • Perf regression: json, plaintext #54765
  • [Blazor] OnKeydown event strange behavior, use enter key to search #54684
  • NavigationManager issue in blazor webAssembly App #54682
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.QuickGrid fails with "BLAZOR106: The JS module file wwwroot/_content/Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.QuickGrid/QuickGrid.razor.js' was defined but no associated razor component or view was found for it." #54644
  • Blazor SSR: per-user state management #47796
  • Json Binding cannot be case sensitive. #54773
  • Blazor Server page crashing after reconnect with multiple clients #53730
    8.0.x
  • In Blazor Web App InteractiveWebAssembly, using select with onchange event does not work when clicking from dropdown, but work with up/down key from keyboard. #54732

PullRequests

Created

  • Update EOL versions for `releases/8.0` #54791
    area-infrastructure
  • Add entry-point APIs for OpenAPI support #54789
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal
  • Switch to Mariner images #54787
    area-infrastructure
  • Added retry for CheckInvalidHostingModelParameter #54786
    area-infrastructure
  • Update-eol-versions-6.0 #54784
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Reduce helix-matrix timeout to 3 hours #54779
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • [release/8.0] Reduce helix-matrix timeout to 3 hours #54778
    area-infrastructure, 8.0.x
  • [release/7.0] Reduce helix-matrix timeout to 3 hours #54777
    area-infrastructure, 7.0.x
  • Reduce helix-matrix timeout to 3 hours #54776
    area-infrastructure
  • Fix node-externals submodule exclusion #54774
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/8.0] Fix route analyzer performance with highly concatenated strings #54763
    Servicing-consider, area-infrastructure, 8.0.x
  • [release/8.0] Improve usage of `Type.GetType` when activating types in data protection #54762
    area-dataprotection, Servicing-consider, 8.0.x
  • Include ContentLength when enumerating HttpHeaders #54760
    area-networking

Merged

  • Quarantine some 'ThreadingAppTest' and 'ThreadingHostedAppTest` tests #54755
    area-blazor, 9.0-preview4
  • Quarantine tests in `ServerRenderingTests.FormHandlingTests.FormWithParentBindingContextTest` #54758
    area-blazor, 9.0-preview4
  • Fix dockerfile references for helix #54752
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview4

Updated

  • Make the key ring cache expire shortly after an immediately-activated key is generated #54517
    area-dataprotection
  • Implement Redis distributed cache without Lua #54689
    feature-caching, area-networking
  • Use constant values for CorsPolicy.cs and CorsPolicyBuilder.cs #54247
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-middleware
  • [release/6.0] Convert to 1ES templates #54656

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • shell flyout background image does not display on windows platform #21472
  • Picker() on Mac Catalyst does not display dialog with items #21470
  • iOS "Unable to load image file" on implicitly referenced project #21469
  • [Android] Shell.FlyoutIcon doesn't show correctly. #21466
  • [Android] System.ObjectDisposedException: ObjectDisposed_StreamClosed #21461
  • Scale transform seems relative instead of absolute? #21457
  • TableSection.TextColor does not work with DynamicResource #21456
  • iOS PopModalAsync causes memory leaks #21453
  • iOS: App Crashes when ObservableCollection is modified inside a Task #21452
    .NET 8 SR5
  • [Windows] Performance of gesture updating #21449
  • Deployment or Debug removes files in FileSystem.AppDataDirectory #21445
  • The entry input cursor and the lower border line color have related properties that can be set directly. #21441

Closed

  • [iOS] Physical Phone device won't open any Maui App with .Net 8 #21444
  • [Documentation] Dev Guide for Mac needs some refreshing #21465
  • [WinUI] Add tests for loading fonts when unpackaged #20791
    .NET 8 SR4
  • RadioButton IsChecked Binding does not work on iOS nor Windows #11125
    Backlog
  • NullReferenceException in Android TabbedPageManager #21393
  • UdpClient on IOS: No route to host #21451
  • MeasureFirstItem makes items disappear on Android #7562
    .NET 8 SR4
  • [MacCatallyst-arm64] app file size is extremely large for custom configuration #21332
  • The color of the Entry input cursor should be the same as the text color, and the color of the lower border can be modified. #21442

PullRequests

Created

  • Move 10234 to Appium #21471
  • [Windows] Ensure images in buttons never scale up, only down #21463
    platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-button

  • fix issue in orientation of images #21458

    area/perf 🏎️, community ✨, area/gestures

  • Make the dev docs more betterer #21467

    area/Xaml </>
  • [Windows] Cache full app package file path #21246
    platform/windows 🪟, area/perf 🏎️, community ✨

Updated

  • [macOS] Make window overlay to redraw correctly during window resizing #21371
    platform/macOS 🍏, community ✨, control-window
  • [iOS] Use updated APIs for the button with images #20953
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-button

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • EntityTypeBuilder.ToFunction vs ModelBuilder.HasDbFunction inconsistencies in inheritance mapping? #33408
  • Test "Add_update_delete_query_throws_if_no_container" fails only on C.I #33402
    Backlog
  • Disable injection of LazyLoader in some situations #33400

Closed

  • Are Indexes working for .net 8? #33396
  • `00000000000005_Migration5` in `MigrationsInfrastructureTestBase` assumes that `int Bar` is `string Bar` #33331
    9.0.0-preview4
  • OutOfMemoryException when scaffolding from database since upgrade to EF Core 8 #33406
  • Deletion can cause error "The association between entity types A and B has been severed..." #33365
  • InvalidCastException for EntityEntry.Reload() with complex type and TPH #33307
    9.0.0-preview4
  • Update Microsoft.CodeAnalysis version #32926
    9.0.0-preview2
  • Incorrect warning for TPC and Guid Id #31629
    9.0.0-preview3
  • Reference navigations for required relationships should be nullable #33401

PullRequests

Created

  • Handle private properties in the compiled model #33409
  • Apply fill factor when creating tables #33407
  • Only use length-based sized type inference for string concat #33403

Merged

  • Disable Cosmos test failing on C.I. #33405
  • Correct value type in hard-coded migrations test #33404
  • Return flattened properties of complex types in correct order #33393
  • Fix key generation validation for TPC. #33371
  • Configure the guardian baseline path #33398

Updated

  • Introduce liftable constants to shaper to prepare for precompilation #33351
  • [release/8.0] Onboard the official build to 1ES pipeline templates #33305
    tell-mode
  • [release/7.0] Onboard the official build to 1ES pipeline templates #33304
    tell-mode
  • [release/6.0] Onboard the official build to 1ES pipeline templates #33303
    tell-mode
